text:
BioNTech-Pfizer said that their #vaccine showed 100% efficacy against #COVID19 in 12-15 year old children.
The vaccine shot is based on novel mRNA technology.
#biontech #Pfizer #PfizerBioNTech #vaccination #COVIDSecondWave #CovidVaccine #coronavirus #CoronaVirusUpdates #pandemic https://t.co/ql3uJ7e3mV
